fulltext:
DUC, DANG MINH 
Senior Software Engineer 
Email: mrdukly@gmail.com 
Phone: (+84) 933 583 947 
Skype: minhduc_uit 
Friend’s phone: (+65) 8691 3486 
SUMMARY 
• 
Quick learning/research new technology and eager to solve new challenge 
• 
Having 7 years as software developer and having knowledge in financing and computer vision 
• 
Able to lead the team (having 3 years experienced as technical leader) 
• 
Having 1 year in Japan for researching and developing product using machine learning  
• 
Familiar in Scrum process and able to coach team member to follow 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
• 
Programming Languages: Python, C++, Java 
• 
Frameworks/ Platforms: OpenCV, Tensorflow, HARK, Spring Boot, AngularJS, MQTT, XMPP 
• 
Database Management Systems: MySQL, MongoDB, Oracle, MS SQL, PostgreSQL 
• 
IDEs: Eclipse, Intelij 
• 
Operating Systems: Windows, Linux, MacOS 
• 
Others: AWS, Maven, OpenCV, Jenkins, TeamCity 
• 
Foreign Languages: English 
• 
Soft Skills: Problem solving, Critical thinking, Teamwork, Training members 
EDUCATION 
• 
University of Information Technology – Master, Computer Science (2015 - 2018) 
• 
University of Information Technology – Bachelor, Computer Science (2008 - 2013) 
2/4 
PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE  
Project: SmartApp – Commonwealth Bank Indonesia 
10/2018 - now 
Position: Technical Leader 
Project size: 10 people 
Project Description: Application is able to:  
• 
Supporting customers to create bank account and virtual card 
• 
Using micro services architecture 
• 
Connecting to LiveBank system to confirm and verifying customer via video call 
• 
Integration with core banking and execute some businesses process like RBA checking, negative 
list checking… 
Responsibilities 
• 
Manage development process 
• 
Estimate and suggest solution for team member 
• 
Involve in development team to develop system architecture 
• 
Reviewing and handling high complexity tasks 
• 
Packaging and deploying application 
Technologies Used: 
• 
Spring boot, Thymeleaf, Flyway, Hibernate, Kafka, Feign, WSO2 
• 
MSSQL Database 
Project: Icampus 
02/2018 – 10/2018 
Position: Technical Leader 
Project size: 15 people 
Project Description: Application is able to:  
• 
Allowing users to register and study courses using web application 
• 
Tracking user’s study result and sending notification via email, zalo  
• 
Allowing admin who can manage role and manage courses 
• 
Integrate the result with third party services 
Responsibilities 
• 
Estimate and suggest solution for team member 
• 
Review code 
• 
Packaging and deploying application 
Technologies Used: 
• 
Spring boot, AngularJS, Karma, LRS System 
• 
NPM Node JS, Webpack 
• 
Oracle Database 
3/4 
Project: Voice Recognition – Onsite at Honda Research Institute - Japan 
05/2017- 02/2018 
Position: Technical Leader 
Project size: 4 people 
Project Description: Application is able to:  
• 
Detecting voice activity  
• 
Preprocessing analog voice to digital voice features 
• 
Voice recognition and sending the result via MQTT protocol 
• 
Sound source separation and sound source localization  
Responsibilities 
• 
Work as leader onsite team in FPT to management team and development application  
• 
Research and develop application 
• 
Review code 
• 
Build and deploy 
Technologies Used: 
• 
Python, C++ 
• 
MQTT, TCP Socket, HARK, Kaldidecoder 
Project: OCR for Receipts/ID Cards 
02/2017-05/2017 
Position: R&D Engineer/Research 
Project Description:   
• 
Extracting fields and recognizing texts from receipts/bills image, which have extremely complex 
background 
Responsibilities:  
• 
Applying SIFT, Pyramid Kernel to extract line. 
• 
Rebuild the neural network CNN+LSTM to recognize texts from line. 
• 
Image Binarize, Line Extraction, Denoise, DeSkew, Synthesize training data 
• 
Fuzzy matching texts with database. 
• 
Tuning model: Make it smaller, faster, debug model weights. 
Accomplishments: Successfully re-train with customer’s data using Tensorflow 
Technologies: 
• 
TensorFlow, Deep Learning, Tesseract, Ocropus, OpenCV 
4/4 
Project: CEMP - FPT 
07/2016 – 02/2017 
Position: Senior Software Engineer.  
Project size: 10 people. 
Project Description: Building a web application to manages equipment  
• 
Create request build model 
• 
Manage request, manage utilization, import and export report 
• 
Manage role, privilege of user and using email to notification  
Project: PPHONTAI - FPT 
11/2015– 06/2016 
Position: Software Engineer 
Project size: ~300 people 
Project Description: Build an android application to manage transport product  
• 
Type information from sender and receiver by scanner barcode or input manually 
• 
Calculate the shipping fee, delivery time, shipping vehicle, tax 
• 
View orders, connect to scanner device and printing report 
Project: ALAG – Axon Active Viet Nam 
11/2014 – 10/2015 
Position:  Software Engineer 
Project size: 8 people. 
Project Description: Maintain and develop new features for an enterprise application of a Switzerland 
company, ALAG. This application is for managing leasing cars. The aim of the project is to automate the 
whole process of leasing cars from the point client make a request to process through several business 
processes until the contract actually signed and run. 
Project: Web Application – Viet Nhan Digital 
07/2012 – 9/2013 
Position: Software Engineer.  
Project size: 4 people. 
Project Description:  Build an e-commerce website to show up the technology products and manage the 
shopping cart from user. 
-

roject Description: • Extracting fields and recognizing texts from receipts/bills image, which have extremely complex background
